// Cookie utility functions for language persistence
export const setCookie=function(name,value){let days=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:30;const expires=new Date();expires.setTime(expires.getTime()+days*24*60*60*1000);const domain=window.location.hostname;document.cookie="".concat(name,"=").concat(value,"; expires=").concat(expires.toUTCString(),"; path=/; domain=").concat(domain);};export const getCookie=name=>{const nameEQ=name+"=";const ca=document.cookie.split(';');for(let i=0;i<ca.length;i++){let c=ca[i];while(c.charAt(0)===' ')c=c.substring(1,c.length);if(c.indexOf(nameEQ)===0)return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);}return null;};export const deleteCookie=name=>{const domain=window.location.hostname;document.cookie="".concat(name,"=; expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 UTC; path=/; domain=").concat(domain);};
